original: intros X Y uX uY. unfold upwards_closed_Kdenote in *. intros m1 m2 m n Hjoin [m1' [m2' [Hjoin1 [HX HY]]]] Hm. destruct (join_Korder_down m1' m2' m1 n) as [n1 [Hjoin2 Hle1]]. apply Hjoin1. apply (uX n m1 Hm) in HX. apply (uY n m1 Hm) in HY. exists n1. split. apply Hjoin2. split. apply HX. apply HY.
